src:
20+ Photos Proving That the Beauty of People From Previous Generations Is a Unique Thing

01 Nov 2019, 09:30

You will probably agree with the idea that photos from previous centuries have some charm about them. Yes, in the past, photos were almost like treasures and people really prepared for them: they chose their clothes, did their hair, thought about the perfect positions, and as a result, created a small masterpiece. But it is not just that: the people in these portraits have a special look.
The Bright Side team is convinced that the bright and expressive faces in these old photos are seen less often now. And in order to prove our point, we have prepared a collection of portraits that has both the celebrities of that time and regular people — someone’s great-grandmothers and great-grandfathers.
1. American actress from the silent movie era, actress Marie Doro, 1902


© Burr McIntosh / Wikimedia  

2. “My beautiful great-grandmother. Late 1950s”


© lolaloopyloo / Reddit  

3. American actress Ethel Clayton, 1910


© Bain News Service / Wikimedia  

4. “My great-grandmother in the 1930’s”


© SunsetLiquid / Reddit  

5. American movie and theater actress Maude Fealy, the 1900s


© Unknown / Wikimedia  

6. “My great-grandmother in 1930”


© ThatsGottaBeKane / Reddit  

7. A Victorian era woman getting photographed for the first time, the 1890s


© saraboulos / Reddit  

8. “My beautiful grandmother, 1949”


© / Imgur  

9. Algerian girl, around 1905


© Lehnert & Landrock / Wikipedia  

10. “My great-great-grandmother, late 1910s”


© brh1010 / Reddit  

11. American actress Julia Marlowe, 1899


© Ye Rose Studio / Wikipedia  

12. French dancer Cléo de Mérode, 1902


© Wikimedia  

13. “My great-great-grandfather, 1889”


© jaKAms / Reddit  

14. Maude Adams, American theater actress, 1890


© Unknown / Wikimedia  

15. “My great-grandmother, 1917”


© dicerollinggirl / Reddit  

16. Minnie Ashley, American actress, 1896


© Benjamin Joseph Falk / Wikipedia  

17. “My great-great-grandmother in the 1890s”


© ranchochupacabrash / Reddit  

18. Ione Bright, Broadway actress, 1912


© UghSheGiggin / Reddit  

19. “My great-grandfather, Sherman Herbert Ford, around 1900”


© SixSpice / Reddit  

20. British actress Evelyn Laye, 1917


© unknown photographer / Wikimedia  

21. “My beautiful grandmother in 1955”


© missdrywit / Reddit  

22. American actress Evelyn Nesbit, 1901


© E Eickemeyer / Wikipedia  

23. “A photo of my great-great-grandmother taken in the early 1900s, when she was only 6 years old”


© Undidiridium_ / Reddit  

Do you know anything about your great-great-grandmothers and great-great-grandfathers? Do you have photos of them?
Preview photo credit Undidiridium_ / Reddit
